brownie.title: Brownie
brownie.description: Erratic enemies that can attain an instant state of high tension, only to topple over and go off the boil.
brownie.secondaryDescription: ${Bodkin bowyer}s often take them on camping trips and trick them into tapping in their tent pegs for them.
